name: X Doors Away
description:
⚠ For a crisper experience, I highly suggest downloading the game for Windows. ⚠ Description

X Doors Away is a puzzle platformer in which you must navigate the maze-like structure in order to reach the end. 

But beware!

 The level sequence is non-linear, you must try to remember which levels lead to which if you hope to achieve your goal. 

Perseverance & perception

Perseverance and perception are key in this short experience. The perspective makes it hard to judge the placement of certain platforms. You must use all the tools and skill at your disposal to achieve your goal. Never forget, if you try hard enough you will eventually succeed!

Controls

Move : W/A/S/D or Arrow Keys
Jump : Press Space Bar
Restart Level : Hold R

Controller is also supported but you will still need a mouse to navigate the menus...

Move : Left Joystick
Jump : Press A
Restart Level : Hold B

The assets I used :
Flat Kit : Toon Shading and Water by DustyRoom
FEEL by MoreMountains
Quick Outline by Chris Nolet
Nebula Skyboxes by Road Turtle Games
Fantasy Exploration Music by  Jared Alexander Johnson

This game was created in 72 hrs for the Winter Jam by SoloDevelopment.
